title: Luffy's Best Gear 2 Moments in One Piece, Ranked
author: Sam Fang
description: A ranking article exploring Luffy's most significant Gear 2 moments throughout One Piece. Notes that Episode 272 marks the moment when Luffy 'finally unleashes his new way to take his abilities one step higher, revealing Gear 2 to the world.'
spoilerScope: Contains spoilers for episodes beyond 272, covering Gear 2 moments throughout the series

title: One Piece: The Enies Lobby Arc, Explained
description: Comprehensive explanation of the Enies Lobby Arc, including the introduction of Gear 2 and its significance to the story.
spoilerScope: Contains spoilers for the entire Enies Lobby Arc

title: Gear 5 Luffy May Be Popular, But It's Not the One Piece Pirate's Best Form
description: Opinion piece arguing that Gear 2 is more impactful than Gear 5. Notes that Gear 2's debut was executed flawlessly without overwhelming fanfare, and is considered the series' most impactful power-up.
spoilerScope: Contains spoilers comparing all Gear forms including Gear 5

title: One Piece: A Complete List of Luffy's Gears Explained
description: Comprehensive guide explaining all of Luffy's Gear transformations, including how Gear 2 works by speeding up blood flow to increase oxygen and nutrients throughout his body.
spoilerScope: Contains spoilers for all Gear transformations throughout the series

title: 272-273: Almost to Luffy! Gather at the Courthouse Plaza!
author: Never Watched One Piece
description: Blog post summarizing episodes 272-273, covering the Straw Hats' power demonstrations, Gomorrah's determination, and Luffy's Gear 2 revelation.

title: One Piece: Water 7/Enies Lobby Arc Review
author: Travis and Ant
description: Podcast episode reviewing the Water 7 and Enies Lobby arcs, described as 'one of the greatest arcs in all of One Piece.'
spoilerScope: Contains spoilers for entire Water 7 and Enies Lobby arcs

title: One Piece Episode 272 UNCUT REACTION | YO WTF SECOND GEAR LUFFY
author: Cruz Brothers React
description: Reaction video to Episode 272, capturing first-time viewers' response to Gear 2's debut.

title: When does Luffy first unlock every gear transformation in One Piece? explained
description: Article detailing when Luffy unlocks each Gear transformation throughout One Piece, noting that Gear 2 debuts in Episode 272 during the Enies Lobby arc.
spoilerScope: Contains spoilers for all Gear transformations

title: One Piece: 5 Forgotten Secrets About Luffy's Gear Techniques
description: Article exploring lesser-known facts about Luffy's Gear techniques, including development context and mechanics.
spoilerScope: Contains spoilers about all Gear techniques
